attributes.action: Find funding for Enviromentally friendly communities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people would like to go green, solar, wind etc, so if communities got together would the PM back this and look at finding funding to assist these projects, enabling britain to cut emmissions. Not the 30% return thats been offered in the form of grants in the past! This would allow for not only community cohession but more green fuel
